extensions.name: IPFS Resolver
extensions.description: Enable IPFS content resolution and serving through your AR.IO gateway
extensions.longDescription: The IPFS Resolver extension allows your AR.IO gateway to fetch and serve content from the InterPlanetary File System (IPFS). This enables seamless interoperability between Arweave and IPFS networks, allowing users to access IPFS content through familiar AR.IO gateway URLs. Features include automatic IPFS gateway fallback, content caching, and configurable pinning strategies.
extensions.author: AR.IO Labs

extensions.name: ArNS Content Moderation
extensions.description: Community-driven content filtering and moderation for ArNS names
extensions.longDescription: A moderation tool that allows gateway operators to implement content filtering based on community-maintained blocklists and allowlists. Supports multiple moderation strategies including keyword filtering, content hash blocking, and ArNS name filtering. Operators can subscribe to trusted moderation lists or create their own custom rules.
extensions.author: CommunityMods

extensions.name: Gateway Performance Monitor
extensions.description: Real-time performance metrics and monitoring dashboard for your gateway
extensions.longDescription: Comprehensive monitoring solution that tracks gateway performance metrics including response times, cache hit rates, bandwidth usage, and error rates. Features a built-in web dashboard with real-time graphs, alerting capabilities, and integration with popular monitoring services like Prometheus and Grafana.
extensions.author: MetricsLab

extensions.name: Smart Cache Optimizer
extensions.description: AI-powered caching strategy optimizer for improved gateway performance
extensions.longDescription: Uses machine learning to analyze access patterns and optimize caching strategies for your gateway. Automatically adjusts cache sizes, TTLs, and eviction policies based on content popularity and access patterns. Includes predictive pre-fetching for frequently accessed content chains.
extensions.author: CacheFlow

extensions.name: AR.IO Developer Tools
extensions.description: Enhanced debugging and development tools for gateway operators
extensions.longDescription: A comprehensive suite of developer tools including request/response inspection, transaction tracing, manifest debugging, and ArNS resolution testing. Features a browser-based interface for real-time debugging and a CLI for automated testing and scripting.
extensions.author: AR.IO Labs

extensions.name: Geographic Load Balancer
extensions.description: Route requests to optimal gateways based on geographic location
extensions.longDescription: Intelligent routing extension that directs user requests to the nearest or best-performing gateway based on geographic location, latency measurements, and gateway health. Supports custom routing rules and failover strategies for high availability deployments.
extensions.author: GeoRoute Inc

extensions.name: DDoS Shield Pro
extensions.description: Advanced DDoS protection and rate limiting for AR.IO gateways
extensions.longDescription: Protects your gateway from distributed denial-of-service attacks with intelligent traffic analysis and automatic mitigation. Features include adaptive rate limiting, IP reputation scoring, challenge-response verification, and real-time attack analytics. Integrates with Cloudflare and other CDN providers for enhanced protection.
extensions.author: SecureGate Systems

extensions.name: Gateway Backup & Sync
extensions.description: Automated backup and synchronization between multiple gateway instances
extensions.longDescription: Ensures high availability and data redundancy by automatically backing up gateway configuration, cache, and state to multiple locations. Supports real-time synchronization between gateway instances, automated failover, and point-in-time recovery. Compatible with S3, Google Cloud Storage, and Arweave for backup storage.
extensions.author: DataVault Inc

extensions.name: Gateway Analytics Pro
extensions.description: Comprehensive analytics and business intelligence for gateway operators
extensions.longDescription: Transform your gateway data into actionable insights with advanced analytics dashboards. Track revenue metrics, user behavior, content popularity, and performance trends. Features customizable reports, data export capabilities, and integration with popular BI tools like Tableau and PowerBI.
extensions.author: InsightFlow Analytics

extensions.name: PayGate - Gateway Monetization
extensions.description: Accept payments and implement subscription models for premium gateway services
extensions.longDescription: Monetize your gateway services with flexible payment options including cryptocurrency payments, subscription tiers, and pay-per-use models. Supports integration with Stripe, PayPal, and major crypto payment processors. Features automated billing, usage tracking, and customer management tools.
extensions.author: PayGate Solutions

extensions.name: TurboCache CDN Accelerator
extensions.description: Global CDN integration for ultra-fast content delivery
extensions.longDescription: Accelerate content delivery by integrating your gateway with a global CDN network. Automatically caches and serves content from edge locations closest to your users. Features smart routing, image optimization, automatic compression, and real-time purging capabilities. Reduces bandwidth costs and improves user experience.
extensions.author: TurboCache Networks

extensions.name: AI Content Classifier
extensions.description: Automatically classify and tag content using advanced AI models
extensions.longDescription: Leverage state-of-the-art AI models to automatically classify, tag, and index content passing through your gateway. Supports image recognition, text analysis, and metadata extraction. Enables advanced search capabilities, content recommendations, and automated content organization. Privacy-preserving with on-device processing options.
extensions.author: NeuralIndex Labs
